original_text: For the unbelieving husband has been sanctified through his wife, and the unbelieving wife has been sanctified through her believing husband. Otherwise your children would be unclean, but as it is, they are holy.
korean_text: 믿지 아니하는 남편이 아내로 말미암아 거룩하게 되고 믿지 아니하는 아내가 남편으로 말미암아 거룩하게 되나니 그렇지 아니하면 너희 자녀도 깨끗하지 못하니라 그러나 이제 거룩하니라

sentences.original_text: has been sanctified through his wife
has been sanctified through her believing husband
Otherwise your children would be unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇지 않으면 너희 자녀들이 부정할 것입니다
